In a small town, a shopkeeper works hard every day. But one day he closed his shop in the _ and went home. He was very tired, he didn't have supper and went to bed at once. At that time the telephone _ . A man said, "What time do you open your _ ,sir?" The shopkeeper was unhappy. He thought the man played a trick on him. He did not answer it and went _ to bed. A few minutes _ the telephone rang again. He got up and went to pick up the phone and found that voice   was the _ man and he asked the same question. The shopkeeper _ answered. "You needn't ask me that because I can't let you come into my shop. It's late now."
"No. I want to go out." the man said, "My wife is waiting for me at home for dinner now."
